00039         public function ready($var)
00040         {
00041                 return (isset($var) && !empty($var)) ? true : false;
00042         }

00051         public function hex_to_base64($str) {
00052             $raw = '';
00053             for ($i=0; $i < strlen($str); $i+=2) {
00054                 $raw .= chr(hexdec(substr($str, $i, 2)));
00055             }
00056             return base64_encode($raw);
00057         }

00066         public function to_query_string($array)
00067         {
00068                 $t = array();
00069                 foreach ($array as $k => $v)
00070                 {
00071                         $t[] = rawurlencode($k) . '=' . rawurlencode($v);
00072                 }
00073                 return implode('&', $t);
00074         }
00075 
00083         public function to_signable_string($array)
00084         {
00085                 $t = array();
00086                 foreach ($array as $k => $v)
00087                 {
00088                         $t[] = $k . $v;
00089                 }
00090                 return implode('', $t);
00091         }
00092 
00116         public function query_to_array($qs)
00117         {
00118                 $query = explode('&', $qs);
00119                 $data = array();
00120 
00121                 foreach ($query as $q)
00122                 {
00123                         $q = explode('=', $q);
00124 
00125                         if (isset($data[$q[0]]) && is_array($data[$q[0]]))
00126                         {
00127                                 $data[$q[0]][] = urldecode($q[1]);
00128                         }
00129                         else if (isset($data[$q[0]]) && !is_array($data[$q[0]]))
00130                         {
00131                                 $data[$q[0]] = array($data[$q[0]]);
00132                                 $data[$q[0]][] = urldecode($q[1]);
00133                         }
00134                         else
00135                         {
00136                                 $data[urldecode($q[0])] = urldecode($q[1]);
00137                         }
00138                 }
00139                 return $data;
00140         }

00152         function size_readable($size, $unit = null, $retstring = null)
00153         {
00154                 // Units
00155                 $sizes = array('B', 'kB', 'MB', 'GB', 'TB', 'PB');
00156                 $mod = 1024;
00157                 $ii = count($sizes) - 1;
00158 
00159                 // Max unit
00160                 $unit = array_search((string) $unit, $sizes);
00161                 if ($unit === null || $unit === false)
00162                 {
00163                         $unit = $ii;
00164                 }
00165 
00166                 // Return string
00167                 if ($retstring === null)
00168                 {
00169                         $retstring = '%01.2f %s';
00170                 }
00171 
00172                 // Loop
00173                 $i = 0;
00174                 while ($unit != $i && $size >= 1024 && $i < $ii)
00175                 {
00176                         $size /= $mod;
00177                         $i++;
00178                 }
00179 
00180                 return sprintf($retstring, $size, $sizes[$i]);
00181         }
00182 
00189         function time_hms($seconds)
00190         {
00191                 $time = '';
00192 
00193                 $hours = floor($seconds / 3600);
00194                 $remainder = $seconds % 3600;
00195                 if ($hours > 0)
00196                 {
00197                         $time .= $hours.':';
00198                 }
00199 
00200                 $minutes = floor($remainder / 60);
00201                 $seconds = $remainder % 60;
00202                 if ($minutes < 10 && $hours > 0)
00203                 {
00204                         $minutes = '0' . $minutes;
00205                 }
00206                 if ($seconds < 10)
00207                 {
00208                         $seconds = '0' . $seconds;
00209                 }
00210 
00211                 $time .= $minutes.':';
00212                 $time .= $seconds;
00213 
00214                 return $time;
00215         }
